div.l: A Prentis whylom dwelt in our cyte
Of craft of vytayllers was he
As gaylard he was as gold fynche in þᵉ shawe
Broun as a bery a proper short felawe
Wyth lokkis I kembid ful fetously
Daunce he coude wel and Iolyly
Than he was clepyd Perkyn reuelour
He was as ful of loue and paramour
As is the hyue ful of hony swete
Wel was the wenche that wyth hym myght slepe
And at euery bridale wolde he synge and hoppe
He louyd bettyr the nethir ende than the shoppe
For when ther ony rydyng was in chepe
Out of the shoppe thyder wold he lepe
Tyl that he hadde al the sight y seyn
And daunced wel he wold noght come ayen
And gadryd hym a meyne of hys sort
To hoppe and syng ⁊and make suche dysport
